yacl3.config.configurable-beacons:config: Modifies the range of the Level One beacon. Visit https://minecraft.wiki/w/Beacon to learn about beacon levels
Modifies the range of the Level Two beacon. Visit https://minecraft.wiki/w/Beacon to learn about beacon levels
Modifies the range of the Level Three beacon. Visit https://minecraft.wiki/w/Beacon to learn about beacon levels
Modifies the range of the Level Four beacon. Visit https://minecraft.wiki/w/Beacon to learn about beacon levels
Setting this to true allows beacons to give their effect even if they are outside the rendering distance. Note: Only the beacon will be forceloaded, not the entire chunk
Modifies the duration of the status effect of the Level One beacon. Here, values are in game ticks, not seconds.
Modifies the duration of the status effect of the Level Two beacon. Here, values are in game ticks, not seconds.
Modifies the duration of the status effect of the Level Three beacon. Here, values are in game ticks, not seconds.
Modifies the duration of the status effect of the Level Four beacon. Here, values are in game ticks, not seconds.
